mapper.select: SELECT MAX(STARTDATE) AS STARTDATE, MAX(DEATH_CNT) AS deathCnt, MAX(DECIDE_CNT) AS decideCnt, MAX(CLEAR_CNT) AS clearCnt, SUM(TODAY_CNT) AS todayCnt FROM (SELECT C2.*, TRUNC((I-1)/#{type}) AS INTERVAL FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS I, C1.* FROM (SELECT * FROM CORONADATEINFO WHERE STARTDATE > #{period} ORDER BY STARTDATE DESC) C1) C2) GROUP BY INTERVAL ORDER BY INTERVAL

SELECT MAX(STARTDATE) AS STARTDATE, MAX(DEATH_CNT) AS deathCnt, SUM(TODAY_CNT) AS todayCnt, MAX(AREA) AS AREA FROM (SELECT C2.*, TRUNC((I-1)/#{type}) AS INTERVAL FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS I, C1.* FROM (SELECT * FROM CORONASIDOINFO WHERE STARTDATE > #{period} AND AREA = #{area} ORDER BY STARTDATE DESC) C1) C2) GROUP BY INTERVAL ORDER BY INTERVAL
mapper.update: UPDATE CORONADATEINFO C1 SET TODAY_CNT = DECIDE_CNT - (SELECT DECIDE_CNT FROM CORONADATEINFO C2 WHERE TO_DATE(C2.STARTDATE) = TO_DATE(C1.STARTDATE)-1)
DELETE CORONASIDOINFO WHERE NO IN (SELECT NO FROM CORONASIDOINFO WHERE STARTDATE = '20200408' AND ROWNUM <= 19)
UPDATE CORONASIDOINFO C1 SET TODAY_CNT = DEF_CNT - (SELECT DEF_CNT FROM CORONASIDOINFO C2 WHERE (TO_DATE(C2.STARTDATE) = TO_DATE(C1.STARTDATE)-1) AND (C2.AREA = C1.AREA))
mapper.select: SELECT DEATH_CNT AS deathCnt, DECIDE_CNT as decideCnt, CLEAR_CNT as clearCnt FROM CORONADATEINFO WHERE STARTDATE = (SELECT MAX(STARTDATE) FROM CORONADATEINFO)
SELECT AREA, TODAY_CNT AS todayCnt, DEF_CNT AS defCnt, DEATH_CNT AS deathCnt FROM CORONASIDOINFO WHERE TO_DATE(STARTDATE) = TO_DATE(SYSDATE) ORDER BY STARTDATE DESC, AREA
